Package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnotherClientRMITimeoutException
    AnotherClientRMITimeoutException extends ClientRMITimeoutException, is thrown if client RMI has disconnected during setup situations
    ClientDisconnectionException
    Class ClientDisconnectionException is thrown when server doesn't receive messages from client.
    ClientRMITimeoutException
    class ClientRMITimeoutException is thrown if client RMI has disconnected during setup situations
    FullColumnException
    Class FullColumnException is thrown when the shelf column is full.
    InvalidMatchesException
    class InvalidMatchesException is thrown if the number of matches between the item position in the player shelf and in the template grid of the personal object card is more than 6.
    InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
    Class InvalidNumberOfPlayersException is thrown when number of players entered is less than two or more than four.
    InvalidPointerException
    Class InvalidPointerException is thrown as NullPointerException.
    InvalidSelectionException
    Class InvalidSelectionException is thrown when the Items drawn by the player: -are not in the same column or in the same row on the game board; -are not one after the other on the game board; -have not almost a free side on the game board.
    NoConsecutiveSelectionException
    class NoConsecutiveSelectionException is thrown when two non-consecutive items are drawn from the game board.
    NoElementException
    Class NoElementException is thrown as NoSuchElementException.
    NoFreeSidesException
    Class NoFreeSidesException is thrown when the item selected from the game board has no free sides.
    NoMatchException
    Class NoMatchException is thrown when there aren't existing matches to join.
    NoMoreHeartbeatException
    NoMoreHeartbeatException extends ClientRMITimeoutException, is thrown if client RMI has disconnected during setup situations
    NotMessageFromServerYet
    Class NotMessageFromClientYet is thrown when client doesn't receive messages from server.
    NotSameRowOrColException
    Class NotSameRowOrColException is thrown when the selected items aren't from the same row or column:
    NotSupportedMatchesException
    class NotSupportedMatchesException is thrown when there is an unsupported number of matches.
    OutOfBoundsException
    Class OutOfBoundsException is thrown as ArrayOutOfBoundsException.
    RMIClientDisconnectionException
    Class RMIClientDisconnectionException is thrown as RemoteException.
    SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException
    Class SelectionInvalidOrEmptySlotException is thrown when items selected from the game board are taken from empty or invalid slot.
    TooManyMatchesException
    class NotSupportedMatchesException is thrown when the server has too many matches to manage.
